name: Sentiment Search
slogan: Social media insights specialised for hospitality
description:
Sentiment Search tracks every social and review platform across the Internet for thousands of restaurants and hotels.

Using Artificial Intelligence, we analyse every comment written online and generate a plethora of insights on a location-level, brand-level and industry-level.

These insights can be used to understand how customers perceive every aspect of a business relative to the competition and improve online ratings.

We work with a number of premium restaurants, hotels and PR agencies, including three Michelin-star restaurants.
